home: Hello, welcome to my vueJs Portfolio. I am Aakeefah Jones, Software Engineer student at Life Choices academy. My hobbies include cooking, gaming, coding, reading and writing. Pursuing one of those hobbies ended up working for me. Take a guess at which one I chose.
about: Born 3 Febraury 2005, in the lovely city of Cape Town - I've grown to love coding because of my dad's passion for technology when I was younger. Hey there! I'm Aakeefah Jones, a 19-year-old full-stack developer who's all about making cool websites. I got into the tech world because I love making things look awesome and work smoothly for people. If you couldn't tell by my portfolio - I really love Frontend Developing.

I'm kinda obsessed with the design side of things, making sure it's not just lines of code but actually looks really good. I've got big dreams of turning my coding skills into a business. I want to create websites that go beyond the usual and give people experiences they didn't even know they wanted.

If you're into cool tech stuff or have ideas to share, hit me up! (I speak two English and Afrikaans too if you're looking for a candidate whose multilingual *wink wink ;)* ). I'm open to teaming up or getting involved in exciting projects. Check out the rest of my Portfolio!

experience.role: Using technical skills to create websites for clients.
Called people and got them to purchase a membership.

education.role: Started a 12 month course in the IT industry.

testimonials.name: Zubair
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.quotes: I highly recommend Aakeefah Jones as a software developer. Her technical expertise and commitment to quality make her an asset to any team. I look forward to the opportunity to work with her again in the future.

testimonials.name: Warren
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.quotes: Aakeefah is setting an incredible pace for women in IT. Her determination, expertise, and leadership serve as a remarkable inspiration, paving the way for aspiring women in the field.

testimonials.name: Tamlin Leigh
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.quotes: Hard-working and very dedicated. Her attention to detail and creative approach is something  any team would love to have the honor of working with.

testimonials.name: Muttaqeen
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.quotes: Aakeefah has a strong passion for front-end design and a love for games. She's a fantastic team member, always eager to learn and help out. Her creative skills and positive attitude bring a great vibe to any project.

testimonials.name: Corne
testimonials.title: Student
testimonials.quotes: I had the privilege of studying alongside Aakeefah during our IT coding bootcamp, and I can confidently say she's a standout talent. Aakeefah's dedication, problem-solving skills, and enthusiasm for learning are truly remarkable.

testimonials.name: Matthew
testimonials.title: Lecturer
testimonials.quotes: Aakeefah is hard working and extremely creative. Her positive attitude towards learning shows greatly through her work ethic and her ability to stay consistent.
